name: Hope Pink Ribbon Lapel Pin
description: The unlimited possibilities of the word "HOPE" combined with the Buttons For The Cure logo pink ribbon creates this beautiful, collectible lapel pin. This Cloisonne Lapel Pins is 1-1/2" tall with a military clutch back. 35% Off Quantity Discount: For quantities of 12 or more use the Discount Code: 12ORMORE Shipping Info: All pin orders are processed & shipped out within 1-2 business days. Transit time takes anywhere from 2-4 business days depending upon location. For more information please contact us at: info@buttonsforthecure.com Giving Back: By purchasing Buttons For The Cure products, you are making a difference. A portion of all sales goes toward breast cancer research through donations to the Susan G. Komen Foundation, Komen 3-Day for the Cure, Avon Breast Cancer Walks and other organizations. All artwork, design, photographs © Copyright 2011 Buttons For The Cure
